projects.title: Dapp Poet's Society
projects.bodyText:
- A decentralized Social network where users to share poems.
 - Built a full-stack Web 3.0 project from scratch.
 - Developed and deployed on Rinkeby testnet.

projects.title: Concetto'19
projects.bodyText:
- Web and Android-based ML application for predicting the threat of chronic illness of Heart & Liver.
 - Provides quick results, with an accuracy of over 90%, based on the information provided by the user.

projects.title: PredictMed
projects.bodyText:
- Official Android application of Concetto, tech fest IIT (ISM) Dhanbad.
 - The backend was designed in Firebase. FCM was used for sending notifications.
